data.system_settings: Windows 10 x64 Home CU and LineageOS 14.1 (Android 7.1.2)
data.actual_result: nothing works (not even esc), and you are forced to do ctrl/cmd +r
data.short_description: App becomes unresponsive after deleting a server that was deleted on mobile.
data.steps_to_repro: - make a server on android - on pc, go to server settings - go to delete server - do not type in the server name - go back to android - delete the server using android - go back to pc - hit cancel
